bibl.title: Resurrecting an Ibis Cult. Demotic Votive Texts from the Oriental Institute Museum of the University of Chicago.
bibl.note: Fragments of votive texts coming probably from Medinet Abu [Nos 1-10]. They could date from the late Ptolemaic or even the early Roman period.
bibl.seg: Foy Scalf, Resurrecting an Ibis Cult. Demotic Votive Texts from the Oriental Institute Museum of the University of Chicago.
Fayza Haikal (ed.), Mélanges offerts à Ola el-Aguizy = Bibliothèque d'étude. 164 (Le Caire, 2015) pp. 361-388, 6 pll. n./bl. et coul.
Fragments of votive texts coming probably from Medinet Abu [Nos 1-10]. They could date from the late Ptolemaic or even the early Roman period.
